name: Pocket Legends
description:
Play the world's FIRST and LARGEST free to play mobile MMO Pocket Legends! In this groundbreaking, fantasy game you'll join millions of players from around the world on wild adventures in creepy dungeons, frigid mountain peaks, and steamy swamps.

Massively: Best Smartphone Game 2011

"The best online gameplay on the iPhone" - TouchArcade

"One of the best iPad games of all time" - Appolicious

"World of Warcraft in your pocket" - Yahoo!

Pocket Legends is a FREE, chart-topping, fantasy adventure and 3D Massively-Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game (MMORPG). This smash hit continues to be a fan favorite! Play with your friends and make new friends in fast-paced Co-Op or PVP action.

Assume the role of a powerful bear-like Ursan Warrior, master of all blade weapons. Follow the path of the mystical Elf Enchantress, able to command all of nature’s great and magic power. Become an Avian Archer, an agile hunter and marksman with the bow.

As you defeat rotten zombies, monstrous crocodiles, hostile aliens, capture mighty dragons and save the world of Alterra bringing justice to the land, you will unlock special abilities you may customize to suit your play style. Find rare treasures and gear like magical wands, valyrian steel blades, and elven bows. Travel far and wide because it's a great big world in here!

Play with anyone, anywhere, anytime! If you like World of Warcraft, adventurous temple runs, and strategic gameplay. Take your mission on the go and play Pocket Legends!

Features:
+ Free to play forever
+ Unlock and customize class abilities
+ Thousands of Weapons, Items, and Gear
+ Multiplayer & Solo – Play in Co-Op, PVP, or Solo Mode
+ Worldwide MMORPG – Play with Millions Online
+ Supports iPhone 3GS and newer, iPod 3rd generation 16 gig and newer, all iPad models
+ Plays Across Wi-Fi, Edge, 3G or 4G Networks
